commit message: Fixed home button not working in SearchActivity

Created BaseActivity, from which all other activities are derived

Currently only responsible for theme selection

Fully functional port to ABS.

Currently only for ICS, older Android versions will be implemented
later.
Fixed a number of bugs for pre-ICS devices
Fixed string.isEmpty() and set timeout to 0

Ironed out the webview bug with older devices

WebView would display an infinitely long url instead of the content.
Fixed it by changing wv.loadData to wv.loadDataWithBaseUrl
I think the backwards compatibility justifies calling it v1.0
